page.title: 17TY SIGN JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is for 7 to 11 year olds. It has 11 classes having from 20 to 35 pupils in each. It is quite modern, having been open since 1968, and has 14 classrooms altogether. There are about 330 pupils in the school. It has quite a lot of equipment such as computers, TV's etc. There are two wings to the school, each with two stories and in between there is a hall and a kitchen. The hall is big, with a brown tiled floor. There are two main doors and two not so important ones. Every classroom has lots of windows and at least two blackboards. The children in the school live in council houses and private ones. When we leave this school we go up to Risca Comprehensive which is about a mile away. I like our school.
